OpenRAVE::SensorBase::SensorData

クラス SensorData

used to pass sensor data around [詳細]

すべてのメンバ一覧

Public メソッド

virtual ~SensorData ()
virtual SensorType GetType ()=0
virtual bool serialize (std::ostream &O) const
 Serialize the sensor data to stream in XML format.

Public 変数

uint64_t __stamp
 time stamp of the sensor data in microseconds. If 0, then the data is uninitialized! (floating-point precision is bad here). This can be either simulation or real time depending on the sensor.
Transform __trans
 the coordinate system the sensor was when the measurement was taken, this is taken directly from SensorBase::GetTransform

説明

関数

virtual SensorType GetType (  )  [pure virtual]

LaserSensorData, TouchSensorData, CameraSensorData, JointEncoderSensorData, Force6DSensorData, IMUSensorData, OdometrySensorData, TactileSensorData, と ActuatorSensorDataで実装されています。

bool serialize ( std::ostream &  O  )  const [virtual]

Serialize the sensor data to stream in XML format.

LaserSensorData, TouchSensorData, と CameraSensorDataで再定義されています。

libopenrave.cpp の 2108 行で定義されています。

変数

uint64_t __stamp

time stamp of the sensor data in microseconds. If 0, then the data is uninitialized! (floating-point precision is bad here). This can be either simulation or real time depending on the sensor.

sensor.h の 63 行で定義されています。

Transform __trans

the coordinate system the sensor was when the measurement was taken, this is taken directly from SensorBase::GetTransform
